Class Unlocker

  • java.lang.Object
    • logic.Unlocker
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Unlocker
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    This class is used to represent possible exits openers for the Hero on the current Map.
    Author:
    Jo√£o Vieira, Susana Lima
    See Also:
    Map, Serialized Form

      • Unlocker

        public Unlocker(int x,
                int y,
                char symbol,
                boolean isLever)
        Creates an Unlocker in preferred x and y values and given symbol. Unlocker type is set by isLever.
        Parameters:
        x - the new value of x
        y - the new value of y
        symbol - the new value of symbol
        isLever - the new value of isLever

      • hasReackedUnlocker

        public boolean hasReackedUnlocker(int x,
                                  int y)
        Checks if given x and y values are the same as this Unlocker.
        Parameters:
        x - the coordinate to be checked
        y - the coordinate to be checked
        Returns:
        true if x and y values are the same, else false
